infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We needs camera permissions to allow you to upload profile photos or send photos in support chat.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We needs photo library permissions to allow you to upload profile images or send photos in support chat.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We needs photo library permissions to allow you to upload profile images or send photos in support chat.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: we need microphone permissions to allow you to send audios in support chat.
